title: YouTube for Android rolls out redesigned video player that lets you do more in fullscreen
content:
YouTube tends to overhaul its website and mobile apps component-by-component. The latest example of this is a big redesign, especially in fullscreen mode, of the video player in YouTube for Android.

more…

The post YouTube for Android rolls out redesigned video player that lets you do more in fullscreen appeared first on 9to5Google.
